name: Station (Gnomogames, D4rkRedX, Charmort)
description:
You are driving by yourself late at night across the desert, for some reason your car is making weird noises, so you stop at a gas station to try to search the cause of that sounds. Suddenly you realize that your wheel is deflated and the battery is dead. Now you need to search for a solution but something is wrong, you are completely alone...



We will update this game in the future with more content, stay alert n.n




This project was a submission to the 2021 July Indie Horror Game Jam and was made in two weeks!
